title: gangAdhAra tripura
sahitya:
gangAdhara tripurahara shrI sArangadhara


anupallavi

  shrngAra shekhara shiva shankara jaTAdhara 
bhrngi naTTa nA vinoda bhrngAraka vandita pAda


caraNam 1   haribhUSaNa amarAvana aja sannuta badarivana
tudinAdi tanayApriya dukkha dUra kara kara
    caraNam 2    ahi bhUshana amarAvana aja sannuta badarIvana
duhi nAdi tanaya priya dukha dUra kAlakAla   
    caraNam 3    sadAshiva vinu tAnanda sambhramachita asura madahara
muni pOSaNa mahAdEva shambhO hara
